title.rendered: Email List Management… Everything You Should Know

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1564516249532{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1573232044489{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Get the infographic. Pump up your email campaign strategy.” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:30px|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1573232035897{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1513285685881{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]Hear from more than 60 agencies on what makes their email lists top-notch.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-xs”][vc_column_text]You want your email campaigns to engage and convert. Find out what agencies are doing for their own businesses and their clients to win at email by growing list size and increasing quality. Download the infographic to learn:

  • Why (list) size still matters
  • How email list quality is changing
  • What email campaign tactics are generating real results

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”green” align=”align_left” border_width=”3″ el_width=”20″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1513285999326{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]“Marketers earn $38 for every $1 spent on email marketing.” – Data & Marketing Association[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]

Get Your Email List Strategy Infographic:

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
